code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";const useFetch=url=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.get(url);setData(res.data);}catch(err){setError(err);}setLoading(false);};fetchData();},[url]);const reFetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.get(url);setData(res.data);}catch(err){setError(err);}setLoading(false);};return{data,loading,error,reFetchData};};export default useFetch;
